anime.description: The story takes place in London, at "Café Forbidden," a mysterious café that only opens at night. The protagonist is a girl who is in London to study abroad. She meets the handsome men who work this place where the guardians of the boundary between the human and shadow world gather. Source: ANN

tag.name: reverse harem
tag.description: Reverse harem, or sometimes also male harem, is the common name for the gender-reversed version of the usual http://anidb.net/t2859 [harem genre]. In a reverse harem, instead of the usual situation with several female characters focused on one male character, the viewer sees several male characters surrounding a single female character. Aside from the swapping of the characters` genders, the trope`s details are mostly the same, with the majority of the changes relating to the differences in behavior between men and women of the characters` age range. The most notable exception is that, due to the most relevant characteristics of the trope`s fan base, reverse harem authors tend to go for http://anidb.net/t1760 [bishounen] looks. Though they are also exceptions to the common harem genre, harems with homosexual relationships are not covered by reverse harem.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: 大切な仲間
Important Friends
Taisetsu na Nakama
episode.summary: Though Chris kidnapped Shinyao at Haysin`s request, he`s now taken her to his hideout in order to protect her. Meanwhile, Ton grows closer to the members of the Twilights while investigating her friend`s kidnapping and learns Toryu the jiangshi`s talisman hides a secret. When his talisman is removed, Toryu becomes a weapon bent on destroying everything before it finally self-destructs. When Toryu`s creator removes his talisman and makes him lose control, the Twilights desperately try to stop him. Just when they think they`re out of options, Ton uses the power of her ring and attempts to stick a talisman on Toryu, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ねじれた絆
Twisted Bond
Nejireta Kizuna
episode.summary: Having defeated the serial killer Umbra, they search the building, but Shinyao has vanished. While searching for her whereabouts, Ton learns the four employees of the cafe are members of the Twilights, an organization that seeks coexistence between humans and shadows, and Cafe Forbidden is the organization`s London branch. They blindly continue the search for Shinyao, but only Luke seems to recognize a trace left behind by the culprit. Luke secretly heads out to meet the man who kidnapped Shinyao... where he meets Chris, a young man he knows well. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影と戦う影たち
Shadows Who Fight Shadows
Kage to Tatakau Kage-tachi
episode.summary: As soon as the theft is resolved, Shinyao is kidnapped. Ton visits Café Forbidden once again in order to save her friend. With the help of the cafe`s fourth employee, Wayne the ghost, and Detective Gregory, the truth becomes clear... and they discover the case involves an inhuman Umbra and the smartphone app "Magic Mirror." Ton waits for the trio to return. However, she receives a notification on her phone that Shinyao is in danger. Ton heads off to save her friend alone. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄昏に生きるもの
Those Who Live in the Twilight
Tasogare ni Ikirumono
episode.summary: Shortly after Baileu Ton arrives in London with her friend Mu Shinyao, the girls are robbed. While pursuing the thief, Ton wanders into Cafe Forbidden, a cafe established by her great-grandmother. Cafe employees Vlad, Luke, and Toryu help Ton search for the culprit. When they find the thief, they transform into inhuman vampires, wolfmen, and vampires... Ton is surprised. However, she learns the ring from her great-grandmother that she always wears holds a major secret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力の代償
The Price of Power
Chikara no Daishou
episode.summary: After losing control over her power, Ton collapses. Though she finally awakes, drawing too much power from the ring has caused her to lose her memories of Shinyao. Should she reclaim her memories and use her powers to fight for her friend once more, or would it be better for her to give up those memories and live as an ordinary human...? Concerned for Ton`s happiness, the various members of the Twilights express their toughts to Ton. Meanwhile, Shinyao and Chris continue to flee from Midnight Sun. The Backup, who has been observing them, realizes Shinyao has a strange and mysterious power. When Haysin also expresses interest in her power, the Backup proposes a game. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百年目の覚醒
Awakening of the Century
Hyakunenme no Kakusei
episode.summary: Ton and Shinyao are reunited. They attempt to return to the cafe, but instead are confined within the room. They`re able to escape with Wayne`s help, but he becomes trapped inside a computer by the developer of the Magic Mirror app. While Vlad and Helsing are fighting, Haysin appears before Ton and Shinyao. Haysin claims to be the mastermind behind the series of events and commands an Umbra to attack her. When Ton sees Shinyao fall from the building, the shock causes her to lose control over the power in her ring. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真夜中の太陽
Midnight Sun
Mayonaka no Taiyou
episode.summary: Thanks to Wayne, the members of the Cafe successfully determine Shinyao`s location, but Midnight Sun, the Umbra extermination organization led by Van Helsing XIII, capture Shinyao and Chris first. Ton and her friends fail to rescue Shinyao again. However, Helsing tells Ton he will return Shinyao to her if she accepts his conditions: cease all contact with Umbra and forget about the incident. Helsing`s words leave Ton unsure what to do... That night, Ton leaves the Cafe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖精の恋人
The Fairy`s Lover
Yousei no Koibito
episode.summary: Having cut ties with Haysin, Chris and Shinyao hide together in an abandoned hospital. As Shinyao is dependent on Chris, he begins to see her as more than just the human he kidnapped. Meanwhile, Ton is visited by a beautiful woman named Lydia as the new manager of Cafe Forbidden. Lydia is a leannán sídhe, an kind of Umbra that must never take a human lover. Oblivious to this, Ton accepts her request to find her a human lover. Wayne finds the perfect match for Lydia`s criteria, but... he`s popular musician Roland Lee. He is actually Lydia`s ex-boyfriend and still hasn`t been able to forget her. Roland visits the cafe to meet Lydia, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夜明けに消えぬ影
Shadows That Remain at Dawn
Yoake ni Kienu Kage
episode.summary: Luke, Toryu, and Chris battle against a golem that Haysin repeatedly resurrects using his life energy. Meanwhile, Ton learns she can stop Shinyao by destroying the device inside her body. She tries her best to do so but fails. Just as she`s about to give up, Vlad appears and successfully removes the device from Shinyao. However, having used too much of her strength during the battle, Ton is one step away from becoming an Umbra. Vlad tells her to return to him and breaks his century-long taboo, inching his sharp fangs towards Ton`s neck... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すべてが終わる一日前
The Day Before Everything Ends
Subete ga Owaru Ichinichimae
episode.summary: Problem solving app "Magic Mirror" turns out to actually be an app for manipulating people. Shinyao falls into the hands of app developer Backup. When she absorbs Umbra in an experiment, they learn she can gain their powers. Satisfied with the results, Haysin and Backup agree to wager Ton and Shinyao in a final battle. Meanwhile, at their hideout, the members of the cafe stiffen their resolve in preparation for the final battle. Their goal is to reunite Ton with Shinyao as a human. However, Ton, who has regained her power and is on the verge of becoming an Umbra, ignores Vlad`s attempts to stop her and tries to go save Shinyao... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追われる者と守る者
The Pursued and the Protector
Owareru Mono to Mamoru Mono
episode.summary: The Twilights, Shinyao, and Chris agree to meet in secret so they won`t be noticed by Midnight Sun. Meanwhile, Haysin and the Backup`s game begins: a contest to see if Haysin will awaken Ton`s powers first, or if the Backup will awaken Shinyao`s powers before him. Ton disperses her pursuers as she closes in on Shinyao, but she`s stopped by the powerful Umbra Haysin has unleashed on the city. She`s forced to choose between Shinyao and the lives of the city`s residents. Meanwhile, despite their efforts, Shinyao is captured by the Backup`s soldiers, and Chris falls into the river when he`s shot full of silver bullets... Source: crunchyroll
